Param.Name: MacAddress
Param.Desc: 6 bytes MAC address written in HEX format, e.g. 12:34:56:78:90:ab. Note that it is restricted to set the LSB of the most significant byte

Param.Name: DeviceRole
Param.Desc: WiFi role of the device. Single selection between Station, AP and Peer2Peer Device

Param.Name: IgnoreForceAP
Param.Desc: Applicable for CC3100 only. In case AP is forced via GPIO, setting this option makes the device boot as open AP

Param.Name: CountryCode
Param.Desc: Country Code for regulatory. Supported country codes are: 'US', 'EU' or 'JP'

Param.Name: StationNetworkApplications
Param.Desc: Enabled network applications. Applicable to station role. Multiple choice between HTTP server, mDNS client and Device configuration

Param.Name: ApNetworkApplications
Param.Desc: Enabled network applications. Applicable to AP role. Multiple choice between HTTP server, DHCP server, mDNS client, DNS server and Device configuration

Param.Name: Peer2PeerClientNetworkApplications
Param.Desc: Enabled network applications. Applicable to Peer2Peer client role. Multiple choice between HTTP server, mDNS client and Device configuration

Param.Name: Peer2PeerGroupOwnerNetworkApplications
Param.Desc: Enabled network applications. Applicable to Peer2Peer group owner role. Multiple choice between HTTP server, DHCP server, mDNS client, DNS server and Device configuration

Param.Name: StationTxPowerLevel
Param.Desc: Number in range 0-15dB, indicating a back-off from MAX power. Applicable to station and Peer2Peer client role

Param.Name: APTxPowerLevel
Param.Desc: Number in range 0-15dB, indicating a back-off from MAX power. Applicable to AP and Peer2Peer group owner role

Param.Name: OneTimeCalibration
Param.Desc: Setting this parameter would make the device calibrate only once, ignoring periodic calibration as a result of duration/temperature

Param.Name: StationAddressingScheme
Param.Desc: Setting static IP parameters or get it dynamically via DHCP. Applicable to station and Peer2Peer client role

Param.Name: StationIPAddress
Param.Desc: IP address is relevant in case of Static Addressing scheme only. E.g. 192.168.1.1. Applicable to station and Peer2Peer client roles only. Note that Station IP and Station Default Gateway must reside on the same network.

Param.Name: StationSubnetMask
Param.Desc: Subnet Mask is relevant in case of Static Addressing scheme only. E.g. 255.255.255.0. Applicable to station and Peer2Peer client roles only

Param.Name: StationDefaultGateway
Param.Desc: Default Gateway is relevant in case of Static Addressing scheme only. E.g. 192.168.1.254. Applicable to station and Peer2Peer client roles only. Note that Station IP and Station Default Gateway must reside on the same network.

Param.Name: StationDNSServer
Param.Desc: DNS Server is relevant in case of Static Addressing scheme only. E.g. 192.168.1.254. Applicable to station and Peer2Peer client roles only

Param.Name: ApAddressingScheme
Param.Desc: Setting static IP parameters or get it dynamically via DHCP. Applicable to AP and Peer2Peer group owner role

Param.Name: ApIPAddress
Param.Desc: IP address is relevant in case of Static Addressing scheme only. E.g. 192.168.1.1. Applicable to AP and Peer2Peer group owner roles only. Note that AP IP and AP Default Gateway must reside on the same network.

Param.Name: ApSubnetMask
Param.Desc: Subnet Mask is relevant in case of Static Addressing scheme only. E.g. 255.255.255.0. Applicable to AP and Peer2Peer group owner roles only

Param.Name: ApDefaultGateway
Param.Desc: Default Gateway is relevant in case of Static Addressing scheme only. E.g. 192.168.1.254. Applicable to AP and Peer2Peer group owner roles only. Note that AP IP and AP Default Gateway must reside on the same network.

Param.Name: ApDNSServer
Param.Desc: DNS Server is relevant in case of Static Addressing scheme only. E.g. 192.168.1.254. Applicable to AP and Peer2Peer group owner roles only

Param.Name: Channel
Param.Desc: Operating WiFi channel. Number in range 1-13

Param.Name: HiddenSSID
Param.Desc: Setting this option makes SSID not being broadcast in AP role

Param.Name: SSID
Param.Desc: SSID indicates the name of the network in AP role. SSID is a string up to 32 bytes

Param.Name: SecurityType
Param.Desc: WiFi Security Type in AP role. Single selection between Open, WEP and WPA

Param.Name: WEPKeyFormat
Param.Desc: WEP key format in AP role. Either Hexadecimal or ASCII

Param.script: if (SecurityType==WEP) {if (WEPKeyFormat==ASCII) {assertExactLengths(5, 13, Password);} else {assertConvertWepHex2Ascii(Password)}} else if (SecurityType==WPA) {assertLenRange(8, 63, Password);}
Param.Name: Password
Param.Desc: WiFi password in AP role. For WEP, it is either 5 bytes or 13 bytes, Hexadecimal or ASCII format. For WPA, it is 8-63 bytes

Param.Name: BeaconInterval
Param.Desc: Beacon Interval is the interval between AP beacons notifications. It is represented in TUs where each TU (Time Unit) is 1024 uSec

Param.Name: DTIMInterval
Param.Desc: DTIM Interval is the interval between beacons containing broadcast information. It is represented in Beacon Intervals

Param.Name: DeviceURNName
Param.Desc: In Peer2Peer Device role, represents the device name. In AP role, part of the default SSID. It is a string up to 33 bytes

Param.Name: DeviceDomainName
Param.Desc: Denotes the domain name of the device. Can be used to connect to the device. It is a string up to 24 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient1Status
Param.Desc: 1st mDNS service status

Param.Name: mDNSClient1ServiceName
Param.Desc: 1st mDNS service name. Service name is a string up to 100 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient1ServiceNameLen
Param.Desc: 1st mDNS service name size. Number up to 100 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient1TextRecord
Param.Desc: 1st mDNS service text record. Service text record is a string up to 255 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient1TextRecordLen
Param.Desc: 1st mDNS service text record size. Number up to 255 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient1Port
Param.Desc: 1st mDNS service port

Param.Name: mDNSClient1TTL
Param.Desc: 1st mDNS service TTL in seconds

Param.Name: mDNSClient2Status
Param.Desc: 2nd mDNS service status

Param.Name: mDNSClient2ServiceName
Param.Desc: 2nd mDNS service name. Service name is a string up to 100 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient2ServiceNameLen
Param.Desc: 2nd mDNS service name size. Number up to 100 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient2TextRecord
Param.Desc: 2nd mDNS service text record. Service text record is a string up to 255 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient2TextRecordLen
Param.Desc: 2nd mDNS service text record size. Number up to 255 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient2Port
Param.Desc: 2nd mDNS service port

Param.Name: mDNSClient2TTL
Param.Desc: 2nd mDNS service TTL in seconds

Param.Name: mDNSClient3Status
Param.Desc: 3rd mDNS service status

Param.Name: mDNSClient3ServiceName
Param.Desc: 3rd mDNS service name. Service name is a string up to 100 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient3ServiceNameLen
Param.Desc: 3rd mDNS service name size. Number up to 100 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient3TextRecord
Param.Desc: 3rd mDNS service text record. Service text record is a string up to 255 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient3TextRecordLen
Param.Desc: 3rd mDNS service text record size. Number up to 255 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient3Port
Param.Desc: 3rd mDNS service port

Param.Name: mDNSClient3TTL
Param.Desc: 3rd mDNS service TTL in seconds

Param.Name: mDNSClient4Status
Param.Desc: 4th mDNS service status

Param.Name: mDNSClient4ServiceName
Param.Desc: 4th mDNS service name. Service name is a string up to 100 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient4ServiceNameLen
Param.Desc: 4th mDNS service name size. Number up to 100 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient4TextRecord
Param.Desc: 4th mDNS service text record. Service text record is a string up to 255 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient4TextRecordLen
Param.Desc: 4th mDNS service text record size. Number up to 255 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient4Port
Param.Desc: 4th mDNS service port

Param.Name: mDNSClient4TTL
Param.Desc: 4th mDNS service TTL in seconds

Param.Name: mDNSClient5Status
Param.Desc: 5th mDNS service status

Param.Name: mDNSClient5ServiceName
Param.Desc: 5th mDNS service name. Service name is a string up to 100 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient5ServiceNameLen
Param.Desc: 5th mDNS service name size. Number up to 100 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient5TextRecord
Param.Desc: 5th mDNS service text record. Service text record is a string up to 255 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient5TextRecordLen
Param.Desc: 5th mDNS service text record size. Number up to 255 bytes

Param.Name: mDNSClient5Port
Param.Desc: 5th mDNS service port

Param.Name: mDNSClient5TTL
Param.Desc: 5th mDNS service TTL in seconds

Param.Name: DHCPServerLeaseTime
Param.Desc: DHCP Lease time in seconds

Param.Name: DHCPServerIPStart
Param.Desc: Start IP Address provided by the DHCP server. E.g. 192.168.1.2

Param.Name: DHCPServerIPEnd
Param.Desc: End IP Address provided by the DHCP server. E.g. 192.168.1.254

Param.Name: HTTPServerPort
Param.Desc: HTTP server TCP port

Param.Name: HTTPServerAccessRomPages
Param.Desc: Setting this option allows the HTTP server an access to HTML pages placed in ROM

Param.Name: HTTPServerAuth
Param.Desc: HTTP server authentication

Param.Name: HTTPServerUser
Param.Desc: HTTP server authenticated username. User is a string up to 20 bytes

Param.Name: HTTPServerPass
Param.Desc: HTTP server authenticated password. Password is a string up to 20 bytes

Param.Name: HTTPServerRealm
Param.Desc: HTTP server authenticated Realm. Realm is a string up to 20 bytes

Param.Name: Profile1Disabled
Param.Desc: Profile1 status

Param.Name: Profile1Priority
Param.Desc: Profile1 priority [0-255]

Param.Name: Profile1SSID
Param.Desc: Profile1 peer SSID in station role or remote device in Peer2Peer role. String up to 32 bytes

Param.Name: Profile1SSIDLen
Param.Desc: Profile1 peer SSID length in station role or remote device length in Peer2Peer role. Number up to 32 bytes

Param.Name: Profile1BSSIDSet
Param.Desc: Profile1 peer BSSID mechanism. Setting this option make use of BSSID (and SSID) during WiFi connection while in station role. In Peer2Peer role, it denotes the peer MAC address

Param.Name: Profile1BSSID
Param.Desc: Profile1 peer BSSID in station role or Peer2Peer remote device MAC address. 6 bytes MAC address written in HEX format, e.g. 12:34:56:78:90:ab

Param.Name: Profile1SecurityType
Param.Desc: Profile1 security type. Single selection between Open, WEP, WPA, Peer2Peer and Enterprise

Param.Name: Profile1P2pSecurity
Param.Desc: Profile1 Peer2Peer security type. Single selection between P2P_NONE, P2P_PBC, P2P_PIN_KEYPAD and P2P_PIN_DISPLAY

Param.Name: Profile1P2pPin
Param.Desc: Profile1 Peer2Peer PIN code. Should be 8 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile1WepKeyFormat
Param.Desc: Profile1 WEP key format. Either Hexadecimal or ASCII

Param.Name: Profile1WepKey
Param.Desc: Profile1 WEP key. Either 5 bytes or 13 bytes key, Hexadecimal or ASCII format

Param.Name: Profile1WepKeyLen
Param.Desc: Profile1 WEP key length. Either 5 bytes or 13 bytes, Hexadecimal or ASCII format

Param.Name: Profile1WpaKey
Param.Desc: Profile1 WPA passphrase. It is 8-63 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile1WpaKeyLen
Param.Desc: Profile1 WPA passphrase length. It is 8-63 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile1PMK
Param.Desc: Profile1 WPA PMK. Always 32 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile1EAPType
Param.Desc: Profile1 EAP type. Single selection between TLS, TTLS, PEAP and FAST

Param.Name: Profile1UserIdentity
Param.Desc: Profile1 user identity. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile1UserIdentityLen
Param.Desc: Profile1 user identity length. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile1AnonymousIdentity
Param.Desc: Profile1 anonymous identity. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile1AnonymousIdentityLen
Param.Desc: Profile1 anonymous identity length. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile1UserPassword
Param.Desc: Profile1 user password. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile1UserPasswordLen
Param.Desc: Profile1 user password length. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile1EapCredentials
Param.Desc: Profile1 user password. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile1EAPSubType
Param.Desc: Profile1 EAP sub type. Single selection between MSCHAPv2, TLS and PSK. Applies only if EAPType is either TTLS or PEAP

Param.Name: Profile1PEAPVersion
Param.Desc: Profile1 PEAP version. Single selection between Version0 and Version1

Param.Name: Profile1EAPFastProvisioning
Param.Desc: Profile1 EAP Fast provosioning. Single selection between Unauthenticated and Authenticated

Param.Name: Profile1EapMethod
Param.Desc: Profile1 EAP Method. This is a mask collection of EAPSubType, PEAPVersion and EAPFastProvisioning

Param.Name: Profile1PmkSet
Param.Desc: Profile1 PMK set. 0x1 for WPA, 0x0 for others.

Param.script: if (Profile1SecurityType==Open || Profile1SecurityType==WEP || Profile1SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {0;} else if (Profile1SecurityType==WPA || Profile1SecurityType==Enterprise) {18;}
Param.Name: Profile1PairwiseCipher
Param.Desc: Profile1 Pairwise cipher suite. Multiple selection between TKIP=0x8 and CCMP=0x10

Param.script: if (Profile1SecurityType==Open || Profile1SecurityType==WEP || Profile1SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {0;} else if (Profile1SecurityType==WPA || Profile1SecurityType==Enterprise) {18;}
Param.Name: Profile1GroupCipher
Param.Desc: Profile1 Group cipher suite. Multiple selection between TKIP=0x8 and CCMP=0x10

Param.script: if (Profile1SecurityType==Open || Profile1SecurityType==WEP || Profile1SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {4;} else if (Profile1SecurityType==Enterprise) {1;} else if (Profile1SecurityType==WPA) {2;}
Param.Name: Profile1KeyManagement
Param.Desc: Profile1 Key management suite. Multiple selection between 8021X=0x1, PSK=0x2 and NONE=0x4

Param.script: if (Profile1SecurityType==Open || Profile1SecurityType==WEP || Profile1SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {0;} else if (Profile1SecurityType==WPA || Profile1SecurityType==Enterprise) {3;}
Param.Name: Profile1SecProto
Param.Desc: Profile1 Security Protocol suite. Multiple selection between WPA=0x1 and RSN=0x2

Param.Name: Profile1AuthAlgo
Param.Desc: Profile1 authentication algo. 0x1 for WPA and Enterprise, 0x0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile1ScanSSID
Param.Desc: Profile1 scan SSID with Probe Requests. 0x0 for Peer2Peer, 0x1 for others.

Param.Name: Profile1EapFlags
Param.Desc: Profile1 EAPOL flags. 0x3 for Enterprise, 0x0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile1EapFragmentSize
Param.Desc: Profile1 EAP fragment size. 1398 for Enterprise, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile1EapWA
Param.Desc: Profile1 EAP workaround. -1 for Enterprise, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile1WpaHandshake
Param.Desc: Profile1 WPA peer key handshake. 1 for WPA, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile1EapClientCert
Param.Desc: Profile1 client certificate ID. 1 for TLS based, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile1EapPrivateKey
Param.Desc: Profile1 client private key ID. 2 for TLS based, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile1EapFastPac
Param.Desc: Profile1 client PAC for Fast. 3 for FAST, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile2Disabled
Param.Desc: Profile2 status

Param.Name: Profile2Priority
Param.Desc: Profile2 priority [0-255]

Param.Name: Profile2SSID
Param.Desc: Profile2 peer SSID in station role or remote device in Peer2Peer role. String up to 32 bytes

Param.Name: Profile2SSIDLen
Param.Desc: Profile2 peer SSID length in station role or remote device length in Peer2Peer role. Number up to 32 bytes

Param.Name: Profile2BSSIDSet
Param.Desc: Profile2 peer BSSID. Setting this option make use of BSSID (and SSID) during WiFi connection while in station role. In Peer2Peer role, it denotes the peer MAC address

Param.Name: Profile2BSSID
Param.Desc: Profile2 BSSID or Peer2Peer remote device MAC address. 6 bytes MAC address written in HEX format, e.g. 12:34:56:78:90:ab

Param.Name: Profile2SecurityType
Param.Desc: Profile2 security type. Single selection between Open, WEP, WPA, Peer2Peer and Enterprise

Param.Name: Profile2P2pSecurity
Param.Desc: Profile2 Peer2Peer security type. Single selection between P2P_NONE, P2P_PBC, P2P_PIN_KEYPAD and P2P_PIN_DISPLAY

Param.Name: Profile2P2pPin
Param.Desc: Profile2 Peer2Peer PIN code. Should be 8 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile2WepKeyFormat
Param.Desc: Profile2 WEP key format. Either Hexadecimal or ASCII

Param.Name: Profile2WepKey
Param.Desc: Profile2 WEP key. Either 5 bytes or 13 bytes key, Hexadecimal or ASCII format

Param.Name: Profile2WepKeyLen
Param.Desc: Profile2 WEP key length. Either 5 bytes or 13 bytes, Hexadecimal or ASCII format

Param.Name: Profile2WpaKey
Param.Desc: Profile2 WPA passphrase. It is 8-63 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile2WpaKeyLen
Param.Desc: Profile2 WPA passphrase length. It is 8-63 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile2PMK
Param.Desc: Profile2 WPA PMK. Always 32 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile2EAPType
Param.Desc: Profile2 EAP type. Single selection between TLS, TTLS, PEAP and FAST

Param.Name: Profile2UserIdentity
Param.Desc: Profile2 user identity. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile2UserIdentityLen
Param.Desc: Profile2 user identity length. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile2AnonymousIdentity
Param.Desc: Profile2 anonymous identity. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile2AnonymousIdentityLen
Param.Desc: Profile2 anonymous identity length. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile2UserPassword
Param.Desc: Profile2 user password. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile2UserPasswordLen
Param.Desc: Profile2 user password length. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile2EapCredentials
Param.Desc: Profile2 user password. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile2EAPSubType
Param.Desc: Profile2 EAP sub type. Single selection between MSCHAPv2, TLS and PSK. Applies only if EAPType is either TTLS or PEAP

Param.Name: Profile2PEAPVersion
Param.Desc: Profile2 PEAP version. Single selection between Version0 and Version1

Param.Name: Profile2EAPFastProvisioning
Param.Desc: Profile2 EAP Fast provosioning. Single selection between Unauthenticated and Authenticated

Param.Name: Profile2EapMethod
Param.Desc: Profile2 EAP Method. This is a mask collection of EAPSubType, PEAPVersion and EAPFastProvisioning

Param.Name: Profile2PmkSet
Param.Desc: Profile2 PMK set. 0x1 for WPA, 0x0 for others.

Param.script: if (Profile2SecurityType==Open || Profile2SecurityType==WEP || Profile2SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {0;} else if (Profile2SecurityType==WPA || Profile2SecurityType==Enterprise) {18;}
Param.Name: Profile2PairwiseCipher
Param.Desc: Profile2 Pairwise cipher suite. Multiple selection between TKIP=0x8 and CCMP=0x10

Param.script: if (Profile2SecurityType==Open || Profile2SecurityType==WEP || Profile2SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {0;} else if (Profile2SecurityType==WPA || Profile2SecurityType==Enterprise) {18;}
Param.Name: Profile2GroupCipher
Param.Desc: Profile2 Group cipher suite. Multiple selection between TKIP=0x8 and CCMP=0x10

Param.script: if (Profile2SecurityType==Open || Profile2SecurityType==WEP || Profile2SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {4;} else if (Profile2SecurityType==Enterprise) {1;} else if (Profile2SecurityType==WPA) {2;}
Param.Name: Profile2KeyManagement
Param.Desc: Profile2 Key management suite. Multiple selection between 8021X=0x1, PSK=0x2 and NONE=0x4

Param.script: if (Profile2SecurityType==Open || Profile2SecurityType==WEP || Profile2SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {0;} else if (Profile2SecurityType==WPA || Profile2SecurityType==Enterprise) {3;}
Param.Name: Profile2SecProto
Param.Desc: Profile2 Security Protocol suite. Multiple selection between WPA=0x1 and RSN=0x2

Param.Name: Profile2AuthAlgo
Param.Desc: Profile2 authentication algo. 0x1 for WPA and Enterprise, 0x0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile2ScanSSID
Param.Desc: Profile2 scan SSID with Probe Requests. 0x0 for Peer2Peer, 0x1 for others.

Param.Name: Profile2EapFlags
Param.Desc: Profile2 EAPOL flags. 0x3 for Enterprise, 0x0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile2EapFragmentSize
Param.Desc: Profile2 EAP fragment size. 1398 for Enterprise, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile2EapWA
Param.Desc: Profile2 EAP workaround. -1 for Enterprise, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile2WpaHandshake
Param.Desc: Profile2 WPA peer key handshake. 1 for WPA, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile2EapClientCert
Param.Desc: Profile2 client certificate ID. 1 for TLS based, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile2EapPrivateKey
Param.Desc: Profile2 client private key ID. 2 for TLS based, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile2EapFastPac
Param.Desc: Profile2 client PAC for Fast. 3 for FAST, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile3EapFragmentSize
Param.Desc: Profile3 EAP fragment size. 1398 for Enterprise, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile3EapWA
Param.Desc: Profile3 EAP workaround. -1 for Enterprise, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile3WpaHandshake
Param.Desc: Profile3 WPA peer key handshake. 1 for WPA, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile3EapClientCert
Param.Desc: Profile3 client certificate ID. 1 for TLS based, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile3EapPrivateKey
Param.Desc: Profile3 client private key ID. 2 for TLS based, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile3EapFastPac
Param.Desc: Profile3 client PAC for Fast. 3 for FAST, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile4Disabled
Param.Desc: Profile4 status

Param.Name: Profile4Priority
Param.Desc: Profile4 priority [0-255]

Param.Name: Profile4SSID
Param.Desc: Profile4 peer SSID in station role or remote device in Peer2Peer role. String up to 32 bytes

Param.Name: Profile4SSIDLen
Param.Desc: Profile4 peer SSID length in station role or remote device length in Peer2Peer role. Number up to 32 bytes

Param.Name: Profile4BSSIDSet
Param.Desc: Profile4 peer BSSID. Setting this option make use of BSSID (and SSID) during WiFi connection while in station role. In Peer2Peer role, it denotes the peer MAC address

Param.Name: Profile4BSSID
Param.Desc: Profile4 BSSID or Peer2Peer remote device MAC address. 6 bytes MAC address written in HEX format, e.g. 12:34:56:78:90:ab

Param.Name: Profile4SecurityType
Param.Desc: Profile4 security type. Single selection between Open, WEP, WPA, Peer2Peer and Enterprise

Param.Name: Profile4P2pSecurity
Param.Desc: Profile4 Peer2Peer security type. Single selection between P2P_NONE, P2P_PBC, P2P_PIN_KEYPAD and P2P_PIN_DISPLAY

Param.Name: Profile4P2pPin
Param.Desc: Profile4 Peer2Peer PIN code. Should be 8 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile4WepKeyFormat
Param.Desc: Profile4 WEP key format. Either Hexadecimal or ASCII

Param.Name: Profile4WepKey
Param.Desc: Profile4 WEP key. Either 5 bytes or 13 bytes key, Hexadecimal or ASCII format

Param.Name: Profile4WepKeyLen
Param.Desc: Profile4 WEP key length. Either 5 bytes or 13 bytes, Hexadecimal or ASCII format

Param.Name: Profile4WpaKey
Param.Desc: Profile4 WPA passphrase. It is 8-63 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile4WpaKeyLen
Param.Desc: Profile4 WPA passphrase length. It is 8-63 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile4PMK
Param.Desc: Profile4 WPA PMK. Always 32 bytes long

Param.Name: Profile4EAPType
Param.Desc: Profile4 EAP type. Single selection between TLS, TTLS, PEAP and FAST

Param.Name: Profile4UserIdentity
Param.Desc: Profile4 user identity. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile4UserIdentityLen
Param.Desc: Profile4 user identity length. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile4AnonymousIdentity
Param.Desc: Profile4 anonymous identity. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile4AnonymousIdentityLen
Param.Desc: Profile4 anonymous identity length. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile4UserPassword
Param.Desc: Profile4 user password. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile4UserPasswordLen
Param.Desc: Profile4 user password length. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile4EapCredentials
Param.Desc: Profile4 user password. Does not apply for TLS EAPType. User identity length + Anonymous identity length + User password length = bounds to 96 bytes

Param.Name: Profile4EAPSubType
Param.Desc: Profile4 EAP sub type. Single selection between MSCHAPv2, TLS and PSK. Applies only if EAPType is either TTLS or PEAP

Param.Name: Profile4PEAPVersion
Param.Desc: Profile4 PEAP version. Single selection between Version0 and Version1

Param.Name: Profile4EAPFastProvisioning
Param.Desc: Profile4 EAP Fast provosioning. Single selection between Unauthenticated and Authenticated

Param.Name: Profile4EapMethod
Param.Desc: Profile4 EAP Method. This is a mask collection of EAPSubType, PEAPVersion and EAPFastProvisioning

Param.Name: Profile4PmkSet
Param.Desc: Profile4 PMK set. 0x1 for WPA, 0x0 for others.

Param.script: if (Profile4SecurityType==Open || Profile4SecurityType==WEP || Profile4SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {0;} else if (Profile4SecurityType==WPA || Profile4SecurityType==Enterprise) {18;}
Param.Name: Profile4PairwiseCipher
Param.Desc: Profile4 Pairwise cipher suite. Multiple selection between TKIP=0x8 and CCMP=0x10

Param.script: if (Profile4SecurityType==Open || Profile4SecurityType==WEP || Profile4SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {0;} else if (Profile4SecurityType==WPA || Profile4SecurityType==Enterprise) {18;}
Param.Name: Profile4GroupCipher
Param.Desc: Profile4 Group cipher suite. Multiple selection between TKIP=0x8 and CCMP=0x10

Param.script: if (Profile4SecurityType==Open || Profile4SecurityType==WEP || Profile4SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {4;} else if (Profile4SecurityType==Enterprise) {1;} else if (Profile4SecurityType==WPA) {2;}
Param.Name: Profile4KeyManagement
Param.Desc: Profile4 Key management suite. Multiple selection between 8021X=0x1, PSK=0x2 and NONE=0x4

Param.script: if (Profile4SecurityType==Open || Profile4SecurityType==WEP || Profile4SecurityType==Peer2Peer) {0;} else if (Profile4SecurityType==WPA || Profile4SecurityType==Enterprise) {3;}
Param.Name: Profile4SecProto
Param.Desc: Profile4 Security Protocol suite. Multiple selection between WPA=0x1 and RSN=0x2

Param.Name: Profile4AuthAlgo
Param.Desc: Profile4 authentication algo. 0x1 for WPA and Enterprise, 0x0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile4ScanSSID
Param.Desc: Profile4 scan SSID with Probe Requests. 0x0 for Peer2Peer, 0x1 for others.

Param.Name: Profile4EapFlags
Param.Desc: Profile4 EAPOL flags. 0x3 for Enterprise, 0x0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile4EapFragmentSize
Param.Desc: Profile4 EAP fragment size. 1398 for Enterprise, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile4EapWA
Param.Desc: Profile4 EAP workaround. -1 for Enterprise, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile4WpaHandshake
Param.Desc: Profile4 WPA peer key handshake. 1 for WPA, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile4EapClientCert
Param.Desc: Profile4 client certificate ID. 1 for TLS based, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile4EapPrivateKey
Param.Desc: Profile4 client private key ID. 2 for TLS based, 0 for others.

Param.Name: Profile4EapFastPac
Param.Desc: Profile4 client PAC for Fast. 3 for FAST, 0 for others.

Param.Name: DefaultGroupId
Param.Desc: Default Group ID for Smart Config. Always 0

Param.Name: DefaultGroupKey
Param.Desc: Default group AES key for Smart Config. Should be 16 bytes long

Param.Name: DefaultGroupKeyLen
Param.Desc: Default group AES key length for Smart Config

Param.Name: GroupId1
Param.Desc: 1st Group ID for Smart Config. Number between 1-15

Param.Name: GroupKey1
Param.Desc: 1st group AES key for Smart Config. Should be 16 bytes long

Param.Name: GroupKey1Len
Param.Desc: 1st group AES key length for Smart Config

Param.Name: GroupId2
Param.Desc: 2nd Group ID for Smart Config. Number between 1-15

Param.Name: GroupKey2
Param.Desc: 2nd group AES key for Smart Config. Should be 16 bytes long

Param.Name: GroupKey2Len
Param.Desc: 2nd group AES key length for Smart Config

Param.Name: ScanChannelMask
Param.Desc: Channels mask for scan process. Multiple choice between Channel1-Channel13

Param.Name: ScanRSSIThreshold
Param.Desc: RSSI threshold for scan process [in dBm]. Negative number represented in 2's complement

Param.Name: ConnectToOpenAP
Param.Desc: Setting this option enables connecting to any open AP

Param.Name: ConnectToAnyPeer2Peer
Param.Desc: Setting this option enables connecting to any Peer 2 Peer device

Param.Name: FastConnectEnable
Param.Desc: Setting this option enables Fast Connection

Param.Name: AutoStartEnable
Param.Desc: Setting this option enables connecting according to stored Profiles

Param.Name: Peer2PeerIntent
Param.Desc: Score indicating how eager the device is to become Peer2Peer client vs. Peer2Peer Group Owner. Number between 0-15 where 0 indicates Client and 15 indicates Group Owner

Param.Name: Peer2PeerNegotiationInitiator
Param.Desc: Policy for initialing negotiation request once a preferred device found. Single selection between Active, Passive and Random Back off

Param.Name: AutoSmartConfig
Param.Desc: Disable or Enable Smart Config upon init

Param.Name: Peer2PeerDeviceType
Param.Desc: Denotes the Peer2Peer device type. Use the default always - "1-0050F204-1".

Param.Name: Peer2PeerListenRegClass
Param.Desc: The device listen band during Peer2Peer discovery phase. Should always be 81 which is 2.4GHz band

Param.Name: Peer2PeerListenChannels
Param.Desc: The device listen channel during Peer2Peer discovery phase. Should be one of the social channels, 1, 6 or 11

Param.Name: Peer2PeerOperRegClass
Param.Desc: The device operation band following Peer2Peer connection. Should always be 81 which is 2.4GHz band

Param.Name: Peer2PeerOperChannels
Param.Desc: The device operation channel following Peer2Peer connection. Should be one of the social channels, 1, 6 or 11

Param.Name: PowerPolicy
Param.Desc: Power policy of the device. Single selection between PM_NORMAL, PM_ACTIVE and PM_LONG_SLEEP. Applicable for Station and Peer2Peer client roles only

Param.Name: LongSleepInterval
Param.Desc: Denotes the desired sleep interval between two consecutive wakeups for beacon reception. Interval in mSec units. Applicable for Station and Peer2Peer client roles only
